fullName.jp: ティナ・ブランフォード

description.jp: 幻獣と人間のあいだに生まれた強力な「魔導の力」を持つ少女。ガストラ帝国の魔導士ケフカに操られ 利用されていたが 反帝国組織「リターナー」に助けられ 共に戦うことになる。世界を守る戦いの中で「人を愛する心」を手に入れた。
description.gl: A young woman born with the gift of magic through her half-Esper blood. Robbed of her emotions, she was put under Imperial general Kefka's control until the Returners rescued and welcomed her into their resistance. Only through her journey does she find out what it means to love.

jp.text: 普通の女の人なら\nその言葉に何かの感情を持つのね
本当に好きなのね……この船が
どーすんの？\nこんな小さい子 いじめちゃって！
ママが みんなの未来を守るから
見つけた！ 愛する心！

gl.text: I suppose a normal girl would have felt something from those words.
Is it true you're a thief?
I wanted to see you again!
You really love this ship、 don't you?
How dare you tease a little girl like that!
Mama has to make this world a safer place.

name.gl: コールアビリティ_ティナ
name.jp: コールアビリティ_ティナ

rank_up_desc.gl:
When Magic Meteor+ (C) triggered:
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt after first HP  attack
 • SPD Down I duration +2
rank_up_desc.jp:
「魔導メテオ＋【C】」発動時
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・最初のHP攻撃後
　与えたHPダメージの20％分自身のBRVをアップさせる
・「素早さ小ダウン」の2ACTION期間延長

name.gl: LDコールアビリティ_ティナ
name.jp: LDコールアビリティ_ティナ

rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Chaos Wave (C):
 • 6-hit group magic BRV  attack + group HP  attack delivered 2 times becomes 8-hit group magic BRV  attack + group HP  attack delivered 2 times; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Increases BRV by 20% of cumulative HP damage dealt after first HP  attack
rank_up_desc.jp:
「ケイオスウェイヴ【C】」使用時
・6HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行うが
　8HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行う
　に変化し合計BRV威力も中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・最初のHP攻撃後
　与えた合計HPダメージの20％分自身のBRVをアップさせる

desc.gl:
Increases BRV based on ATK, then further increases BRV × 1.5
High turn rate
Self: 3 turns ATK Up I; 5 turns MAX BRV Up II

Triggers following Meltdown+ after use:

 • Target: 2 turns DEF Down I

desc.gl:
Increases BRV based on ATK, then further increases BRV × 1.5
High turn rate
Self: 3 turns ATK Up I; 5 turns SPD Up I
Triggers Meteor+:
 • 15-hit group magic BRV attack + single-target HP attack

desc.gl:
Increases BRV based on ATK
6-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 4 turns Loving Heart
Increases special effect Magic by 5 (limit 9)
Extends own active buff duration 2 turns
Instant turn rate

While Loving Heart active:
 • Turn rate becomes instant
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during burst mode, summoning, support
 • Does not consume ability use count (some abilities excluded)
 • Special effect Magic level does not decrease

While special effect Magic at least 1:
 • BRV Regen effect (does not increase with level)

name.jp: メルトン（詠唱）エクステンド

desc.gl:
Meltdown (Chant) use +3

When using Meltdown (Chant):
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on ATK
 • Slight MAX BRV Up effect boost

When using Meltdown+:
 • Adds 4-hit magic BRV attack before HP attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Increases special effect Magic by 5 (limit 9)

While special effect Magic at least 5:
 • Meltdown+ becomes Magic Meltdown+, adds following effects:
 • Large cumulative BRV damage boost
 • Deals 80% HP damage to non-targets
 • Consumes 4 special effect Magic instead of increasing by 5

While special effect Magic at least 1:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Increases special effect Magic by 3 (limit 9)

「メルトン（詠唱）」の使用回数＋3

・「最大BRVアップ」の効果小アップ

・自身に特殊効果「魔導」5加算（上限9）

「メルトン＋」が以下の「魔導メルトン＋」に変化し
以下の効果が追加
・合計BRV威力大アップ
・ターゲット以外にも80％分のHPダメージ
・自身の特殊効果「魔導」5加算が4消費に変化

通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ

Meteor (Chant) use +3

 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

While special effect Magic at least 5:
 • Meteor+ becomes Magic Meteor+, adds following effects:
 • 15-hit group magic BRV attack + single-target HP attack becomes:
 • 5-hit group magic BRV attack + single-target HP attack

While special effect Magic at least 1:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+:
 • Magic BRV attack + HP attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Increases special effect Magic by 3 (limit 9)

desc.jp: 「ケイオスウェイヴ」使用時\n攻撃対象が単体の時\n与えるBRVダメージ10％アップ

short_desc.gl: Chaos Wave Focused Attack: Boost to Chaos Wave

name.jp: 父との共鳴エクステンド

desc.gl: When using Chaos Wave:\n • 6-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times becomes 8-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage\n • Increases BRV by 20% of cumulative HP damage dealt after first HP attack
desc.jp:
「ケイオスウェイヴ」使用時
・6HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行うが
　4HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を4回行う
　に変化し合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・最後のHP攻撃を除くHP攻撃後
　与えた合計HPダメージの50％分自身のBRVをアップさせる

short_desc.gl: Resonance with Father Extension: Boost to Chaos Wave
short_desc.jp: 父との共鳴エクステンド：「ケイオスウェイヴ」の性能アップ
